title: Linux htop Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the powerful htop command in Linux, a real-time system monitoring tool. Learn how to navigate, interact, and customize htop to efficiently monitor and manage your system resources.

meta.title: Linux htop Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the powerful htop command in Linux, a real-time system monitoring tool. Learn how to navigate, interact, and customize htop to efficiently monitor and manage your system resources.
meta.keywords: Linux, htop, system monitoring, system management, process management, resource monitoring, system optimization

verify.name: Verify htop is running
verify.hint: It looks like `htop` is not running. Make sure to start the `htop` command before proceeding.

verify.name: Verify htop customization
verify.hint: It looks like the CPU usage graph is not being displayed in `htop`. Make sure to enable the "Detailed CPU time graph" option in the `htop` setup menu.
